newsitem.title: UK: Goldman sets call warrants on Ericsson.
newsitem.headline: Goldman sets call warrants on Ericsson.

text.p: Goldman Sachs said it has issued a total of 10 million American-style call warrants, in two equal tranches, on shares of Telefonaktiebolaget LM Ericsson.
One share is controlled by 10 warrants.
WARRANT STRIKE ISSUE PREMIUM GEARING MATURITY
CALL A 210 SEK 0.99 DEM 11.09 PCT 5.27 TIMES 12.JAN.98
CALL B 250 SEK 0.96 DEM 28.07 PCT 5.43 TIMES 12.JAN.99
